title: Pay a Property-Related Bill
description: The monthly HOA bill for a managed property has arrived. The agent needs to process the payment from the property's funds.

tasks.description: Receive and scan the HOA bill, extracting the amount due and due date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly digitizes the bill and extracts key information.

tasks.description: Verify that the property's operating account has sufficient funds to cover the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the account balance is adequate.

tasks.description: Schedule the payment through the accounts payable system to be sent before the due date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the bill payment.
